Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: There was one morning were my dad got in my face and screamed *“HAPPINESS IS A CHOICE!”* (I went back to bed. To weary for that shit.)    It’s sad-funny that there are sometimes kernels of truth in stuff like that but people (even mental health professionals) can say it in such massively unhelpful (even harmful) ways. Like, srsly guys...compassion and validation has *got* to be the central message.
